response.overview: SCANDAL brings the second music video collection for the first time in about five years! It covers "HARUKAZE" through "Take Me Out" plus a newly shot music video "SCANDAL BABY" as a bonus video. Also includes a music video of "Dobon Dobondo Dungeon" by Dobon Dobondo (MAMI & TOMOMI) originally included in "Take Me Out [Limited Edition / Type B]." Special Feature / Bonus Track: bonus video footage "SCANDAL BABY" and "Dobon Dobondo Dungeon"
response.title: SCANDAL - VIDEO ACTION 2
